description: Installation of an awning to the front elevation
subdivision_of_building: Front elevation of the ground floor
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the above drawings and documents, Existing Front Elevation 635 E001, Site Plan, MORCO Awnings Specifications Rev B, dated 26.09.2023, Proposed Front Elevation and Section 635 P001, received 21.12.2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The proposed retractable awning shall be retracted fully when the commercial unit is not in use outside of its opening hours of  0700- 1800 Monday to Saturday and 0900- 1700 on Sundays.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site and surrounding area are not adversely affected by visual clutter in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
